value: The mean, or average, is the center of the data and can be found by adding all of the numbers in the set and then dividing the sum by the number of entries.
When we add all $5$ entries, we get $16+32+18+18+36=120.$
Then we divide $120$ by $5$ since there are five numbers in our set of data.
So $120 \div 5 = 24,$ so the mean is $24$ minutes.

The median of a set of data is the middle number when the numbers in the set are placed in order from least to greatest. If there are an even number of entries, the median is the average of the two middle numbers.
When we place all entries in order from least to greatest, we get $2.3,\ 3.4,\ 5.6,\ 5.8,\ 6.8,\ 6.8,\ 9.6,\ 10.9.$
We can see that the numbers in the middle are $5.8$ and $6.8,$ so the median fish length is $\dfrac{5.8+6.8}{2} = 6.3.$
The mode of a set of data is the number that occurs the most. A set of data can have more than one mode.
We see that $21$ occurs twice and all the other numbers occur one time.
So $21$ is the mode of the set of data.
The mean, or average, is the center of the data and can be found by adding all of the numbers in the set and then dividing the sum by the number of entries.
When we add all $7$ entries, we get $9+23+18+6+23+23+24=126.$
Then we divide $126$ by $7$ since there are seven numbers in our set of data.
So $126 \div 7 = 18,$ so the mean is $18$ points.

When we place all entries in order from least to greatest, we get $16,\ 18,\ 18,\ 32,\ 36.$
We can see that the number in the middle is $18,$ so the median is $18$ minutes.
The mode of a set of data is the number that occurs the most. A set of data can have more than one mode.
We see that $6.8$ occurs twice and all the other numbers occur one time.
So $6.8$ is the mode of the set of data.
The mean, or average, is the center of the data and can be found by adding all of the numbers in the set and then dividing the sum by the number of entries.
When we add all $6$ entries, we get $21+37+26+21+42+39=186.$
Then we divide $186$ by $6$ since there are six numbers in our set of data.
So $186 \div 6 = 31,$ so the mean is $31$ inches.

When we place all entries in order from least to greatest, we get $6,\ 9,\ 18,\ 23,\ 23,\ 23,\ 24.$
We can see that the number in the middle is $23,$ so the median points earned is $23.$

So $51.2 \div 8 = 6.4,$ so the mean is $6.4$ inches.
The mode of a set of data is the number that occurs the most. A set of data can have more than one mode.
We see that $23$ occurs three times and all the other numbers occur one time.
So $23$ is the mode of the set of data.
